subject: Indians, American
Colleges and Universities
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The hockey game against the North Dakota Fighting Sioux is a study in the ramifications of the N.C.A.A.’s policy against the use of Indian names, mascots and imagery.
snippet: The hockey game against the North Dakota Fighting Sioux is a study in the ramifications of the N.C.A.A.’s policy against the use of Indian names, mascots and imagery.
